name: Blast Off! It's Party Time
description:
Party with Usagi Panzer and celebrate the first Switching Brains game with fireworks and explosions.

Controls
Use the mouse and click on the mortars to ignite the fireworks.

Credits
Programming; Dennis van Koningsbruggen
Graphics: Dennis van Koningsbruggen
Music: Darren Izzard
Special thanks to: Martijn Stam, Laurent Goedegebuure
